result.markdown:
--- title: Listando tipografías disponibles para Matplotlib date: 2024-04-03 description: Not so easy... categories: [codigo, python, gráficos, matplotlib, fonts] execute: enabled: true freeze: auto --- Fuente: https://jonathansoma.com/lede/foundations-2018/matplotlib/list-all-fonts-available-in-matplotlib-plus-samples/ ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.font_manager from IPython.core.display import HTML def make_html(fontname): return "

{font}: {font}

".format(font=fontname) code = "\n".join([make_html(font) for font in sorted(set([f.name for f in matplotlib.font_manager.fontManager.ttflist]))]) HTML("
{}
".format(code)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
